snippet: As we transition into general election season, a few quick reminders about the philosophy FiveThirtyEight takes toward looking at polls and other important pieces of general-election related data.
abstract: As we transition into general election season, a few quick reminders about the philosophy FiveThirtyEight takes toward looking at polls and other important pieces of general-election related data.

headline.main: Notes on Poll-Watching, as Shift Toward General Election Season Begins
